name: Trick or Treat! (RKade Games)
description:
It's Halloween night and you've dressed up as your Pathfinder character to trick or treat. There's only one problem... Cars! They stand between you and collecting all the candy your little heart could ever want. If this wasn't bad enough, it's progressively getting darker limiting your field of vision.

Collect candy and survive the night! 

  • Project Page

Created as part of Pygame Community Halloween Jam 2022

Notes: 

  • Python 3.9.6
  • PyGame 2.1.2
  • SDL 2.0.18

No external libraries were used in this project and all assets used were created by Patrick Silva, Please credit him if you use these assets moving forward. 

Credits: 

  • Code / Game Design - Roland Kunkel
  • Art / Level Design - Patrick Silva
